extensionDescription.message: Makes Firefox wear a mask to look like Chrome to websites that otherwise won't work.

reportBrokenSite.message: If this site isn't working in Firefox without the mask, but perfectly fine with it, please report that to Mozilla! You can report it $WEBCOMPAT$, or $BUGZILLA$ if you have an account. Thank you! ♥

maskStatusOn.message: The mask is on! I pretend to be Chrome on this site.

maskStatusOff.message: The mask is off. I look like Firefox to this site.

maskStatusUnsupported.message: The mask cannot work on this site.

addSiteHostnameExplanation.message: Note: Always enter the full domain name. If you enter example.com, Chrome Mask will not be active on www.example.com!

addSiteErrorAlreadyActive.message: Chrome Mask is already enabled for this domain!

siteListEmpty.message: You did not enable Chrome Mask on any site yet!
